title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1504.5 - Spacing of sprinkler heads
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1504.5 - Spacing of sprinkler heads

State Regulations
(a) Sprinkler heads shall be located and arranged to spray all parts of the area to
be protected, including closets and alcoves opening from such areas. (b) Spacing of sprinkler heads shall conform
to the requirements of the generally accepted standards listed in the appendix. *
(c) Where practicable, sprinkler
heads shall be installed in the upright position. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1504.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
